content: Determine exactly one command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing an overview of artificial intelligence, including its history, sub-fields, and different types such as reasoning, problem-solving, knowledge representation, learning, natural language processing, and perception. It also covers different techniques and tools used in AI and briefly touches on applications in legal informatics. However, it does not provide a comprehensive list of the different types of AI.

Links: ['Jump to content (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_intelligence#bodyContent)', 'Main page (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page)', 'Contents (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Contents)', 'Current events (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portal:Current_events)', 'Random article (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random)']
Determine exactly one command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : a collection of overviews, articles, and references related to artificial intelligence (AI), covering its history, development, applications, techniques, philosophical and ethical debates, potential risks and benefits, and regulation. It provides a broad understanding of the complex and multifaceted nature of AI and offers a range of perspectives and insights on the subject.
Determine exactly one command to use, and respond using the format specified above:
Failure: command get_hyperlinks returned too much output.                         Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.
